text: Codie Bascue (born July 13, 1994) is an American bobsledder. He is originally from Whitehall, New York. He competed in the two-man event and the four-man event at the 2018 Winter Olympics as a pilot. ==References== ==External Links== * * Codie Bascue at the United States Olympic Committee Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:American male bobsledders Category:Olympic bobsledders of the United States Category:Bobsledders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:People from Whitehall, New York
title: Codie Bascue
